bullish_bearish_calc_desc: The platform aggregates and analyzes viewpoints from 100+ leading cryptocurrency analysts in the market, utilizing AI technology to extract insights from YouTube videos and deeply interpret current market sentiment. Through quantitative analysis, it provides an overall trend forecast of bullish, bearish, or neutral sentiment. This process ensures the diversity and comprehensiveness of the market sentiment data, presented through multiple dimensions of calculated metrics. It is important to note the timeliness of this indicator, as it typically refers to trends within the next 24 hours.
payment_window_message: The system will open a new page for payment, do you confirm?
faq_question1: What is CoinView? What are the platform’s key features?
faq_answer1: CoinView Today is an AI-powered platform that extracts and analyzes sentiment from YouTube video content, aimed at helping users predict and analyze overall trends in the cryptocurrency market. Our core feature lies in utilizing advanced Natural Language Processing (NLP) technology to provide real-time, accurate sentiment analysis by interpreting YouTube creators’ opinions and market sentiment. In addition to summarizing the insights from multiple market analysts, the platform also provides you with daily Bitcoin prices, the Fear and Greed Index, and daily rise/fall probabilities, ensuring you receive the most up-to-date and comprehensive market information.
faq_question2: Is the sentiment analysis data from YouTube videos reliable and timely?
faq_answer2: We leverage advanced AI technology, using Natural Language Processing (NLP) to perform detailed analysis of video content. The content is translated into both Chinese and English, and the system ultimately provides a bullish, bearish, or neutral market sentiment with detailed reasoning. Our real-time analysis is typically completed within 5 to 10 minutes after the video is posted by the creator. Premium members also receive real-time notifications via email and Telegram, ensuring you stay updated on market trends as they happen.
faq_question3: What are the differences between the free and premium versions in terms of platform services?
faq_answer3: Both free and premium users receive daily real-time updates on market data, including Bitcoin prices, the Fear and Greed Index, and rise/fall probabilities. However, free users can only view the video analysis results of 4 analysts recommended by the platform’s algorithm on the homepage. In contrast, premium users can customize and track up to 10 or 50 preferred analysts and access detailed statistical reports in the dashboard to monitor their accuracy. Additionally, premium users will receive video sentiment analysis results via Telegram immediately after the analysts release their content, ensuring timely insights into market trends.
faq_question4: What payment methods does CoinView Today support, and how is payment security ensured?
faq_answer4: CoinView Today supports direct USDT payments through our ecosystem partners, Binance Pay and HxPay. The payment process is highly encrypted, ensuring the security of every transaction and giving you peace of mind while using our services.
faq_question5: Can I customize the YouTube creators I track and get their insights in other formats?
faq_answer5: Yes, by upgrading to the Premium Plan, you can track up to 10 customized YouTube creators and receive personalized sentiment reports. If you need to track more creators, you can choose the Enterprise Plan to track up to 50 creators. Once upgraded to a paid membership, you will be able to automatically track your selected creators in a table format on the dashboard, and even export the data to an Excel report for further analysis.
faq_question6: What should I do if I encounter an issue while using the platform?
faq_answer6: If you encounter any issues while using the platform, you can visit our “FAQ” page for potential solutions, or contact us via email at contact@coinview.today. Additionally, you can reach our support team directly through the Telegram buttons located in the top-right or bottom-right corners. We will assist you as quickly as possible.
faq_question7: What type of subscription service can premium members receive after linking their Telegram account?
faq_answer7: All registered members can link their Telegram account, but only after upgrading to a premium membership can they customize their subscriptions to specific YouTube creators. When these creators release new videos, premium members will receive real-time sentiment analysis notifications via Telegram, as shown in the image below.
about_us_content1: CoinView is a professional derivatives data analysis platform designed to provide cryptocurrency investors with accurate, real-time data support to help users reduce investment risks and maximize returns.
about_us_content2: As a professional derivatives data analysis platform, CoinView offers highly accurate and timely data and analysis. Through various data analysis methods and technical tools, we provide users with comprehensive cryptocurrency derivatives market data, including price trends, market sentiment indexes, YouTube cryptocurrency analyst opinions, and support for custom indicators and strategies.
about_us_content3: To ensure the accuracy and timeliness of the data and analysis, our data team is composed of professionals with extensive experience in quantitative trading and data analysis. Their expertise and skills provide strong support for the accuracy and reliability of the platform’s data.
about_us_content4: In order to provide a more convenient service, our platform is highly user-friendly and easy to use. Users can easily browse and analyze data on the platform to formulate investment strategies.
disclaimer_content1: No Investment Advice The information provided on this website does not constitute investment advice, financial advice, trading advice, or any other sort of advice and you should not treat any of the website's content as such. CoinView does not recommend that any cryptocurrency should be bought, sold, or held by you. Do conduct your own due diligence and consult your financial advisor before making any investment decisions.
disclaimer_content2: Accuracy of Information CoinView will strive to ensure accuracy of information listed on this website although it will not hold any responsibility for any missing or wrong information. CoinView provides all information as is. You understand that you are using any and all information available here at your own risk.
privacy_content1: Effective date: October 10, 2024 CoinView("us", "we", or "our") operates the coinview.today website (the "Service"). This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal data when you use our Service and the choices you have associated with that data. We use your data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. Unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy, terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, accessible from coinview.today.
privacy_content3: We collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Service to you.
privacy_content6: While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you ("Personal Data"). Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to: Cookies and Usage Data.
privacy_content8: We may also collect information how the Service is accessed and used ("Usage Data"). This Usage Data may include information such as your computer's Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.
privacy_content10: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our Service and hold certain information. Cookies are files with small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier. Cookies are sent to your browser from a website and stored on your device. Tracking technologies also used are beacons, tags, and scripts to collect and track information and to improve and analyze our Service.
privacy_content11: You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our Service.
privacy_content12:
Examples of Cookies we use:
Session Cookies. We use Session Cookies to operate our Service.Preference Cookies. We use Preference Cookies to remember your preferences and various settings.Security Cookies. We use Security Cookies for security purposes.
privacy_content14:
CoinView uses the collected data for various

purposes:
To provide and maintain the Service To notify you about changes to our Service To allow you to participate in interactive features of our Service when you choose to do so To provide customer care and support To provide analysis or valuable information so that we can improve the Service To monitor the usage of the Service To detect, prevent and address technical issues
privacy_content16: Your information, including Personal Data, may be transferred to — and maintained on — computers located outside of your state, province, country or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ than those from your jurisdiction. CoinView will take all steps reasonably necessary to ensure that your data is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy and no transfer of your Personal Data will take place to an organization or a country unless there are adequate controls in place including the security of your data and other personal information.
privacy_content18: Legal Requirements: CoinView may disclose your Personal Data in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to: To comply with a legal obligation To protect and defend the rights or property of CoinView To prevent or investigate possible wrong doing in connection with the ServiceTo protect the personal safety of users of the Service or the publicTo protect against legal liability.
privacy_content20: The security of your data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
privacy_content22: We may employ third party companies and individuals to facilitate our Service ("Service Providers"), to provide the Service on our behalf, to perform Service-related services or to assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.These third parties have access to your Personal Data only to perform these tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose.
privacy_content24: We may use third-party Service Providers to monitor and analyze the use of our Service.Google Analytics is a web analytics service offered by Google that tracks and reports website traffic. Google uses the data collected to track and monitor the use of our Service. This data is shared with other Google services. Google may use the collected data to contextualize and personalize the ads of its own advertising network.
privacy_content25: You can opt-out of having made your activity on the Service available to Google Analytics by installing the Google Analytics opt-out browser add-on. The add-on prevents the Google Analytics JavaScript (ga.js, analytics.js, and dc.js) from sharing information with Google Analytics about visits activity.
privacy_content26: For more information on the privacy practices of Google, please visit the Google Privacy & Terms web page: https://policies.google.com/privacy?hl=en
privacy_content28: Our Service may contain links to other sites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit.We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services.
privacy_content30: Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 18 ("Children"). We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 18. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your Children has provided us with Personal Data, please contact us. If we become aware that we have collected Personal Data from children without verification of parental consent, we take steps to remove that information from our servers.
privacy_content32: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. We will let you know via email and/or a prominent notice on our Service, prior to the change becoming effective and update the "effective date" at the top of this Privacy Policy.You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.
bind_telegram_step1: Step 1: Click on this link to open directly or manually enter @CoinViewTGBot in Telegram. Find our official bot subscription channel and click on /start in the top right corner.
bind_telegram_step2: Step 2: Send bind: followed by the email you used to register or log in on this platform, in the format bind:abc123@gmail.com, and wait for the success confirmation message.
